content.p: We know how important your career is to you. That’s why we work with you to make sure you’re moving forward on your career pathway. Our academic promotion procedure make sure our decisions about who to promote are consistent and you get the opportunity to take your next step. We promote our employees based on three areas of achievement: Our promotion process applies to all our Research and Teaching (R&T) staff, including seconded staff in UNMC and UNNC. You can apply for promotion to R&T Level 4, Level 5, Level 6 and Level 7. You’ll also find: A-Z of services A-Z of policies Forms
